scripts.build:desktop: yarn clean:desktop && cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production TARGET_ENV=desktop "yarn build && yarn icon:desktop && yarn sw && node ./build-electron.mjs && electron-builder build --config .electron-builder.config.js"
scripts.build:mobile: cross-env NODE_ENV=production TARGET_ENV=mobile yarn build && yarn icon:mobile && yarn sw
scripts.build:web: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production TARGET_ENV=web "yarn build && yarn icon:web && yarn sw"
scripts.dev:desktop: yarn clean:desktop && cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development TARGET_ENV=desktop "node ./build-electron.mjs && yarn dev:desktop:watch "
scripts.icon:web: yarn icon:web:splashdark && yarn icon:web:splash && yarn icon:web:favicon && yarn icon:web:pwa
scripts.icon:web:favicon: pwa-asset-generator src-www/images/icon-precomposed.svg www/assets/images/icons --index www/index.html --scrape false --type png --icon-only --favicon --padding 0 --maskable false --opaque false && rimraf www/assets/images/icons/manifest-icon-*.png -g
scripts.icon:web:pwa: pwa-asset-generator src-www/images/icon.svg www/assets/images/icons --manifest www/app.webmanifest --index www/index.html --scrape false --type png --icon-only --mstile --maskable --background "#7CB9E8"
scripts.icon:web:splash: pwa-asset-generator src-www/images/splash.svg www/assets/images/icons --manifest www/app.webmanifest --index www/index.html --scrape false --type png --splash-only --background "#7CB9E8"
scripts.icon:web:splashdark: pwa-asset-generator src-www/images/splash.svg www/assets/images/icons --manifest www/app.webmanifest --index www/index.html --scrape false --type png --dark-mode --splash-only --background "#111"
scripts.sw: yarn clean:sw && cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production npx workbox-cli generateSW workbox-config.js
scripts.sw:dev: yarn clean:sw && cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development npx workbox-cli generateSW workbox-config.js
